forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
